attributes.long-description:
Tiny Troopers Joint Ops is an epic bite-sized arcade shooter, filled to the brim with action-packed mini maps of mayhem! Take control of your tiny troopers as you battle evil adversaries from around the world with a multitude of weapons. Recruit specialist mercenaries such as Medics, Machine Gunners and the Elite Delta Force to subdue enemy insurgents! With over 7 hours of gun toting explosive gameplay, Tiny Troopers is miniature warfare on a massive scale! This Cross-Buy product entitles you to download PlayStation Vita, PlayStation 3 and PlayStation 4 versions.

Let’s Fish! Hooked On, the first full-scale fishing game on PlayStation®Vita. Experience realistic fishing action with the excitement of fast arcade style game play and a comprehensive story mode. Tackle 4 challenging game modes to catch up to 9 different kinds of fish, earn up to 240 different lures and play through 11 themed outdoor stages, with online rankings and Trophies to collect.

Let’s Fish! Hooked On
1 Player
864KB File Save Size
Network Features
Touchscreen
Rear Touch Pad
Motion Sensor

Tiny Troopers Joint Ops
1 player
1GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4 Vibration Function
Cross Platform Features PS4™ - PS Vita
HD Video Output 720p,1080i,1080p

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

Wired Arcade Bundle © Wired Productions Ltd. 2015. Tiny Troopers is a registered trademark of Kukouri Mobile Entertainment, and Let’s Fish! Hooked On is a trademark of SIMS Co. Ltd., both under license and published by Wired Productions Ltd.
